personalInfo.name: Ethan
personalInfo.title: I build software to make my life easier.
personalInfo.bio: Computer Science student at UC Santa Cruz with a passion for building scalable applications and elegant user experiences. Currently leading product development at CorkVision, architecting cross-platform solutions with Flutter, AWS, and modern web technologies.

experience.title: Founding Product Engineer
responsibilities: Built over 60% of the production codebase as lead product engineer on a 5-person development team, architecting cross-platform web and mobile applications using Flutter, AWS (RDS, S3, Cognito), and real-time WebSocket integration.
Designed and implemented scalable application architecture that reduced server costs through advanced caching systems.
Eliminated $10-15K monthly in AWS QuickSight fees by developing custom BI solution.
Participated in client-facing discussions with beta wineries to gather product requirements, build technical credibility, and iterate on MVP features for AI-powered data analytics platform.
Collaborated on product roadmap planning and provided technical feasibility analysis for feature prioritization in pre-revenue startup backed by AWS and NVIDIA Inception Program.

experience.title: Founder / Instructor
responsibilities: Built a functional web application allowing users to learn from personally curated college level course content.
Managed 10+ clients simultaneously and handled the day-to-day operations as an independent business owner.
Developed comprehensive C++ curriculum covering data structures, OOP, and algorithm design.

experience.title: Instructor
responsibilities: Designed and taught in-person software courses for students aged 12-16.
Adapted teaching methods to accommodate various skill levels in a classroom.
Simultaneously taught classes with 10-18 students in a range of topics and experience levels.
Created thoughtful lesson plans covering topics such as the video game development life cycle and front-end development.

projects.name: SurfBored
projects.description: The only social app designed to get you off your phone and into real experiences with the people you care about.
highlights: Architected and developed a full-stack mobile application using Flutter for cross-platform deployment, integrating Firebase Authentication and PostgreSQL database with Docker containerization.
Led a team of 3 developers through the complete product lifecycle, coordinating sprint planning, code reviews, and deployment strategies to deliver features on schedule.
Designed and implemented normalized database schemas and state management architecture using BLoC architecture, optimizing app performance and data consistency across user sessions.

projects.name: PerfectLine
projects.description: Educational web application for learning C++ programming
highlights: Deployed responsive web application serving a range of active students with personalized C++ curriculum and progress tracking.
Developed optimal techniques to handle page load, speed, package size and SEO efficiency through the Lighthouse development tool.
Created a CI/CD pipeline using GitHub actions for pushing new releases to deploy the app to the end user.

finalCta.title: Let's Build Something Together
finalCta.subtitle: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision.
